javadoc:
Class for grouping several {@link GTask}s that all should be 
 executed before any new group of tasks are
 executed, regardless of priority.
@see GTaskManager

methods.name: <init>

params.name: description
params.comment: the display name for the group.

params.name: startNewTransaction
params.comment:
if true, any existing transaction (if there is one) will be closed
 and a new transaction will be created.  Otherwise, the tasks in this group will be executed
 in the same transaction as the previous group. Note that this can only happen if there was
 a previous group executing at the time this group is scheduled.

methods.name: addTask
methods.comment:
Add a task to this group with the given priority.  Tasks can only be added to this group
 before the group is added to the GTaskManager.  After that, an IllegalStateException will
 be thrown.

params.name: task
params.comment: the task being added to this group.

params.name: priority
params.comment: the priority for the task within the group.

return.comment: the GScheduledTask created to schedule this task within the group.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a list scheduled tasks in the group.
@return a list scheduled tasks in the group.
methods.name: getTasks
methods.comment: Returns a list scheduled tasks in the group.

return.comment: a list scheduled tasks in the group.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the TaskMonitor that will be used to track the overall progress of tasks within this 
 group.
@return the TaskMonitor that will be used to track the overall progress of tasks within this 
 group.
methods.name: getTaskMonitor
methods.comment:
Returns the TaskMonitor that will be used to track the overall progress of tasks within this 
 group.

return.comment:
the TaskMonitor that will be used to track the overall progress of tasks within this 
 group.

methods.name: wantsNewTransaction
methods.comment:
Returns true if this group wants to start a new transaction when it runs.  Otherwise, the
 group will add-on to any existing transaction from the previous group.

return.comment: true if a new transaction should be started for this group.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a description for the group.
@return a description for this group.
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Returns a description for the group.

methods.javadoc: Cancels the group.  Any tasks that haven't yet started will never run.
methods.name: setCancelled
methods.comment: Cancels the group.  Any tasks that haven't yet started will never run.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if this group was cancelled.
@return true if this group was cancelled.
methods.name: wasCancelled
methods.comment: Returns true if this group was cancelled.

return.comment: true if this group was cancelled.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that a task in the group has been completed.  The group keeps track of the overall
 progress of the tasks completed in this group.  This call is used to notify the group that
 another one of its tasks was completed.
methods.name: taskCompleted
methods.comment:
Notification that a task in the group has been completed.  The group keeps track of the overall
 progress of the tasks completed in this group.  This call is used to notify the group that
 another one of its tasks was completed.

name: GTaskGroup
comment:
Class for grouping several GTasks that all should be 
 executed before any new group of tasks are
 executed, regardless of priority.
